jobs_description.title: Fullstack Developer
jobs_description.description: Developed a real-time dashboard for Customer Premises Equipment (CPE) management, enabling device health monitoring, usage trend analysis, and issue diagnosis.
list: Impact: Aggregated telemetry data to detect anomalies, reducing diagnostic time by 25%; reduced premature cancellations by 40% through proactive customer retention efforts; leveraged Retool to cut development time by 30%.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs_description.description: Engineered a dual-purpose system combining network automation tools and a deeply nested topology traffic diagram.
list: Tech: Python, ReactJS, MongoDB, SSH, Kibana
Impact: Automated commands across multiple devices, reducing manual effort by 33%; built a UI showcasing traffic usage and port speeds to pinpoint bottlenecks and streamline upgrades.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs_description.description: Created an interactive IoT-integrated floorplan control system for real-time monitoring and remote management.
list: Tech: JavaScript, SocketIO, MQTT, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Raspberry Pi
Impact: Enabled remote control and sensor visualization, cutting on-site visits by 40% with automated interventions.

jobs_description.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs_description.description: Crafted a dynamic React.js frontend for a typhoon damage tracking system, delivering real-time dashboards that empowered disaster teams with actionable insights.
list: Tech: React, JavaScript, Hadoop, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, Cron Jobs
Impact: Delivered a scalable UI with big data support and pre-built reports, halving analysis time compared to excel.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a web developer enthusiast with an obsession about automation the tedious tasks.
about.description: Experienced Full-Stack Developer with a strong background in modern web frameworks, backend technologies, cloud platforms, and DevOps. Passionate about building scalable applications with a focus on performance, security, and SEO optimization. Adept at working with microservices, event-driven architectures, and cloud infrastructure. Side hobby as a blogger and content creator with high emphasis on styling and intergrity.
